data.name: Foxy's Adventure
data.detailed_description:
You must save your lover. To do this, you will have to fight against an evil monsters.
You have to collect all gems and cherries in each stages. You will travel through 5 Worlds and fight against Bosses. It won't be an easy journey. So get ready for some real challenge. Good Luck little Fox!


Features:

* You control a little fox in a platform game.
* To pass each stage, collect a certain amount of fruit and gems.
* Your task is to collect a certain number of them.
* Eliminate hordes of enemies on your way.

* Use a boomerang weapon to destroy enemies.
* You can also jump on the heads of some of them.
* Eliminate wooden crates and activate switches on your way.
* Explore 5 worlds with unique gameplay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5300
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 221 MB available space
  • Sound Card: High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce Nvidia MX250
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 221 MB available space
  • Sound Card: High Definition Audio
